SELECT SUBSTRING(observation_time, 1, 4) AS year , id,device_id as "deviceId",flow,observation_time as "observationTime" FROM tb_flow WHERE SUBSTRING(observation_time, 1, 4) = #{year} and status=0
AND device_id = #{deviceId}

SELECT SUBSTRING(observation_time, 1, 7) AS year , id,device_id as "deviceId",flow,observation_time as "observationTime" FROM tb_flow WHERE SUBSTRING(observation_time, 1, 7) = #{yearMonth} and status=0
AND device_id = #{deviceId}

select id, device_id as "deviceId", flow, observation_time as "observationTime", type, user_name as "userName", filepath from tb_flow
and observation_time LIKE '%' || #{tbFlowClass.observationTime}, || '%'
and filename LIKE '%' || #{tbFlowClass.filepath}, || '%'
AND device_id = #{tbFlowClass.deviceId}
AND status = 0
order by observation_time

SELECT STRING_AGG( tbFlow.id ,',' ORDER BY tbFlow.filepath ) AS id, tbFlow.observation_time AS "observationTime", tbFlow.filepath AS "filepath", tbFlow.data_introduction AS "dataIntroduction" , tbFlow.user_name AS "userName" , tbFlow.contact_phone AS "contactPhone" , tbFlow.production_unit AS "productionUnit", tbFlow.open FROM tb_flow AS "tbFlow"
AND observation_time LIKE '%' || #{time} || '%'
AND filename LIKE '%' || #{filepath} || '%'
AND open=#{opens}
and tbFlow.filepath IS NOT NULL and tbFlow.status=0
GROUP BY tbFlow.filepath, tbFlow.data_introduction, tbFlow.user_name , tbFlow.contact_phone, tbFlow.production_unit, tbFlow.observation_time, tbFlow.open
